mapper.update: update act_hi_comment set TYPE_ = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_ = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID_ = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_ID_ = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_ = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_ = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_MSG_ = #{fullMsg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID_, TYPE_, TIME_, USER_ID_, TASK_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, ACTION_, MESSAGE_, FULL_MSG_ from act_hi_comment
